website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind spending a little more money, this huge lava lamp is the one to get.
pros: At 27 inches tall, this is a huge lamp with clear glass and durable construction
cons: Only a few color options available

customer_reviews.title: It was beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: I received my Lava Lamp on January 17th. It was beautiful...purple liquid, yellow wax.. loved it! In the past two days the liquid has turned clear! The lamp does not sit in the sun!. I have no idea why the liquid went clear but am VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: JHeroux

customer_reviews.title: Conversions for international use and filter cloudy liquid.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lava lamp.However, the blue liquid had become very milky due to the international transport (shaking and vibration). So I carefully opened the top seal and filtered the liquid through a old second hand ceramic water filter (takes about 24 hours). This cleared it and now it is beautiful. I also changed the plug and the globe to 220volt as used in our country. None of these issues are manufacturing faults and I am grateful that they were willing to ship to South Africa. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr K.

customer_reviews.title: Big, high quality, easily modifiable!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, Biggest lava lamp I’ve ever seen. Easily modifiable, and paint sticks well after priming. Throw it on an Alexa plug to make it voice controlled and your kids will love it! 100 watt bulb included and it takes about 4-hours to flow properly. Worth the wait! That’s where the Alexa plug shines... you can set up a routine to turn it on in advance of when you want it flowing, and to turn it off so you don’t forget and run it longer than recommended. Going to buy another in purple and yellow/orange for my other son soon.
customer_reviews.author: Long Hair Girl

customer_reviews.title: 27-inch lava lamp is the one to get!
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised by the great difference between the 27-inch and 14-inch versions of the lava lamp. Of course, the 27-inch lava lamp is considerably larger than its smaller cousin. We were expecting that. What surprised us is that the lava flows of the 27-inch lamp are much more dynamic, varied, and visually striking to the eye. You can watch multiple strands and globes of lava going up and down all at once instead of just one sluggish lava ball rising at a time. But you have to be patient. It does take a full 4-5 hours for the lava to heat up and flow in this mesmerizing manner with the larger lamp. Trust us, it is worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Search Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars, because it is absolutely beautiful... However I will need to wait to plug it in because the bulb was completely shattered inside the packed box... Will let you know! Afternote... how to order proper bulb, because the original one in the package was shattered when received. Came in multiples of 10 so I couldn't just order one. Thank you. Plugged it in on Monday and it worked beautifully, and now it has frozen in place and has not worked since.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Thorne

customer_reviews.title: The most ridiculous item that you need in your life
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this lava lamp, it’s much larger than I was expecting. I originally saw this on urban outfitters for twice the price so I instantly purchased it when I found it on amazon. I did not experience any fogginess that others have wrote about. Mine is clear, the glass is nice and smooth and it works perfectly. Took about 6 hours to heat up the first time and now I’d say it’s taking about 5 hours. This lava lamp is ridiculous and I absolutely love it. I honestly don’t know how I was living without it before. It’s so soothing and beautiful I’m obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Martin

customer_reviews.title: Permanent Cloudiness
customer_reviews.text: I tried an tried following all packge advice and from google, none of it worked. Very disapointed, as it is an awesome Huge Lava Lamp, It did come, after opening outer box with significant lava lite box itself After opening the lites box, the glass globe was ok but cap was bent, dent in the metal base , light was bent had to straighten. the glass globes inner bottle cap was dented but ok. Bottom lin.ve item was defective.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Gigantor Lava Lamp
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a BIG lava lamp for his 7th birthday this one does the trick! Lava lamps are fun and mesmerizing he definitely loves it. The only thing bothersome is water part, it is rather murky, as shown in the video I attached for the review. Otherwise, it functions would be nicer if it wasn’t so murky :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanyr6

customer_reviews.title: EPIC PERFECT HUGE LAVA LAMP
customer_reviews.text: This lava lamp is the stuff of my childhood dreams. What I routinely prayed for at Christmas as a child, and never received, I now own. This one. I was concerned about so many negative reviews but this was the biggest lava lamp I could find online so I took my chances with it and I am glad that I did. I bought the blue/green one. It took a while to heat up at first- I was concerned I had a dud for maybe 20-30 minutes but once it kicked off it's been working perfectly since. We've had it over a week now and love it. It makes me so happy to look at. GOOD VIBES MAN
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to warm up....
customer_reviews.text: I just love this huge 27" lava lamp. I was wondering why they didn't make an even bigger one! Then I found out this baby needs a 100W bulb just to get it moving, that's no big deal, but I was even more surprised to find it takes FOUR HOURS from switch on to starting lavaing. Just be aware if you want this for your oh-so-70's evening party, you had better switch it on around lunchtime. Aside from that it is a beautiful product and I hope it lasts for years, like the smaller one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Color dissipates over a few months, by a year the color  is gone
customer_reviews.text: Wax is still yellow, that’s about it. So sad, makes this lamp a huge waste of time and money unless someone knows how to add color to bottle. Not in direct sun, but the contrast color fades, all you have left is yellow in clear water. Obviously there’s a problem here. Other reviews suggest same thing.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Lava lamp
customer_reviews.text: Product lava lamp Grande 27 inch purple liquid what is the yellow wax it came cloudy I requested a replacement it also came cloudy so I returned a replacement purchased another one it came cloudy so I am requesting a refund so I still have The original lamp I Purchased them I’ve been running it for a couple of weeks it’s still cloudy but I can see the wax personally I would not buy the purple liquid with the yellow wax for some reason They all come cloudy and it’s impossible to make them clear by Running them not worth the $109.17
customer_reviews.author: w30olds442

customer_reviews.title: Two lava lamps and all set...
customer_reviews.text: I have a short desk-top model which is quite old, so I bought the 27 inch model and man alive; what a glorious monster lamp it is! Buy two spare light bulbs when ordering the 27 inch creation, because they are special bulbs. The lamp is very easy to assemble and should not be turned on for 24 hours to allow it to reach room temp. That goes for the liquid and wax as well. I have a great view of the floor lamp from my easy chair, and remember to run it for a couple of hours (6-8) at a time, then let it cool. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy
customer_reviews.text: There's something wrong with the blue liquid/yellow wax lamps produced by this company. I've ordered 3 of the 16.5" lamps and they were all cloudy to the point of being unusable. I ordered one of the 27" lamps of a similar color and it too was cloudy. I tried every remedy I could find online to clear up the lamp but none of them worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. You have to turn it on about 3 hours before it warms fully. I turn it on about 4:00 each day. Does wonders for anxiety and creating a calm environment. My package didn't come with a bulb. I had to buy it separately.
customer_reviews.author: travelling mom

customer_reviews.title: Massive lava lamp//works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: So many bad reviews for this & it made me hesitant to order this but decided to say screw it...if it came in cloudy or damaged..amazon has great customer service & should replace it for you..well I got mine & is this thing huge! It came in perfect condition & works amazing! It’s was super clear & does take awhile to heat up but once it does it is the most active lava lamp I have ever owned! Def worth the buy for $70 its 2feet tall...makes my entire room glow in the dark! Super cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Karly Simon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Got it, and honestly this lamp utterly sucks. Fired it up after spending 10 minutes getting the coils on the bottom, and lo and behold its a nasty green murky color not yellow wax and blue water. Completely displeased. Saw other reviews and thought, maybe its a fluke, maybe it will settle down. But after 3 days of running it 12 hrs a day and then letting it stay off like others said. Color has not changed. Murky green water and nasty greenish almost snot looking globs of wax. . . .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Watch it wen doing the burn in. If it goes smoth on first burn then u should be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great very excited during the burn in 3 hrs into the process it blew the lid off of it. Water&wax every were. So be very watchful if u purchase one of these. Thank god no one was close to it wen the happened! But Amazon refunded the full purchase price including shipping. And said do what ever with item. So ima redo it and make my own lamp and do it right. So pls pls beware wen starting the burn in process.
customer_reviews.author: james Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a damaged one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 27” lamp knowing it was discounted because the box was damaged. It did have a ding but it was on the back. The box was in such poor shape that tape had been wrapped around and around to hold it together. The big bummer is that the water is cloudy and not clearing. I contacted support and they had NO CLUE what a LAVA lamp was or how it worked. I’m heartbroken and I will never order anything like this again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: momma dog

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Lava
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this when I got it, but as soon as the second time I turned it on I noticed a dark speck. A couple days later, there's a few, Two weeks or so of owning this and there's a whole lot. I'm guessing the coil is decomposing for some reason, and this seems to be developing at a somewhat exponential rate. I don't know if this is just how it is or a manufacturing error or if I somehow messed something up, but I wouldn't have bought this if I knew it would do this.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: 2 bad attempts to get a gift for my so s Birthday
customer_reviews.text: The wax was stuck all over the inside of the glass when we received it and we thought it would melt and it never did! Then the replacement came and that one had bright spot everywhere and we discovered they were little holes in the film on the outside of the lamp! Two bad lamps. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Accent Piece
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG! It's bright and colorful - and the endlessly changing balls, blobs and elongated shapes are mesmerizing and soothing to watch. I haven't had a visitor yet who wasn't very impressed. In fact, I bought another BIG red one. Unique and true classic, these make engaging centerpieces. They do take six to eight hours to get flowing, but that's no big deal for me - I have them on a timer so they come on early in the morning and go out late at night without me having to even think about it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: Lava Lamps & Science
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lava Lamp because I am in the Heat and Thermal Energy Unit in Science. As a teacher, I use Lava Lamps to help students understand convection and convection currents. It is a visual way of understanding what is happening microscopically. Needless to say, this has been a hit with my students. We all stood around the lava lamp and watched the wax rise up and fall down. While this was going on, I had them talk about density, etc. This science teacher is happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Boston

customer_reviews.title: I've owned these for decades.
customer_reviews.text: I own several early 1980's genuine Lava Lamps that I paid close to 40 bucks each for back then. Standard size, red wax, little holes in the base. Pricey at the time. This 'copy' is very nice! It's my favorite. It was only a few bucks more, for this 27" model, than I paid 35 years ago for the standard size. It takes several hours to warm up, but looks nice doing so.
customer_reviews.author: endsng

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ Grande it’s Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m definitely impressed with this lava lamp, it’s beautiful & makes a huge statement. I purchased the Blue /Yellow wax one the colors are pretty neat the yellow glows & flows . I actually came back & purchased the Purple with Yellow wax & it’s very nice too. I bought my sister the Purple with Pink wax it’s beautiful too....l just love these Grande lamps they are as relaxing to watch as an aquarium....Merry Christmas 🎄 Gift for couples or someone special in your life..
customer_reviews.author: Alexa 4Real

customer_reviews.title: Switch is on cord not the unit itself.
customer_reviews.text: This light should have an on/off knob on the base of the lamp instead on the cord. My previous one had the on/off knob on the base and it was a big disappointment when this lamp was different. I would have returned the lamp if it wouldn't have been such a hassle because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Satriano

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced
customer_reviews.text: Have not got it working yet as initially I could not find the bulb that came with it so went out and bought as 5$ LED and found out that LEDs run at a cooler temp. I then went on Amazon and bought lights advertised with this product for 17$. Found the bulb that came with it to make a story short. This is an edit of my initial review that was bad. 3 stars only because I have not yet witnessed it working.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Lava Lamp and completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lava lamp! It was a gift for my son. He loves it too. Lives up to its size. Does take a longer to heat up the wax inside but that is expected with the size of this lamp! Did not disappoint! Thinking of ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoeffler

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a new lava lamp. But the box it was shipped in I had already been opened, ripped in several places, and re-taped. Also the base of the lamp has two big dings in it. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy water out of the box and no improvement with operation.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 50th anniversary grande lamp that was purchased before Lava Lamp was acquired by this new company, the lamp was awesome. This lamp is pretty disappointing, the water is cloudy out of the box( I returned my first purchase but the replacement was no better), and still is cloudy after weeks of operating per the manufactures suggestion to clear cloudy water. I don’t know if I’m unlucky or this is a result of recent ownership changes. Take a chance if you love Lava Lamps but don’t hesitate to return if you can’t clear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Northpeak

customer_reviews.title: Not Even Close To What Is Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not the product I ordered. The color is all wrong and definitely not what was advertised. I have the smaller version of this lamp and that's how I know it's not the same. Even so, I'll keep it, it is pretty, and it's a pain to send these back. But I don't recommend purchasing from the official company.
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Huge Lava Lamp highly entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This lava lamp is huge! 27” probably doesn’t sound like it but this is the largest Lava I’ve ever owned. It works as expected. However, being a huge lamp it takes several hours for it to heat up and for the lava (wax) to start moving. Don’t touch the lamp or try moving it while it’s warming up or while it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Casto

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lamp about 6 months and I LOVE it! It is so much fun, and so big that it demands attention! It definitely takes longer to heat up when you turn it on, because of its size- I have never timed it, but seems like it takes about 1.5 hours to get the lava really moving.
customer_reviews.author: andsgo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived well-packaged and without damage. I opened it and the product was in perfect condition. It was extremely easy to set up. Mine took about 2 hours to start the "lava" effect the first time. But it is perfect. It is great to look at to de-stress and is an excellent conversation piece in my office! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: msmith9450

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great! Pretty and mesmerizing.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 5 stars, found the bulb buried in packaging. Original review: 2 stars because did not come with bulb. Description says it comes with a bulb. I expect to get all parts when I place an order. Will upgrade when I get bulb from them. This is the 27” lava lamp and is a gift. Finding a 100 watt incandescent is hard.
customer_reviews.author: LimeGreen

customer_reviews.title: Bulb was broke but overall cool product for the lava lamp fan
customer_reviews.text: My son was disappointed to find on Christmas morning that he couldn’t use his new lava lamp because the bulb was busted inside the packaging. Replacement bulb was $10 we will get it on Saturday. Hopefully that’s the only thing wrong with this product because the size is impressive and it seems to be sturdy built. Do wish this company would improve their packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: ACE78

customer_reviews.title: I can tell you that I love it. The multi-colored glass is beautiful and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering what I bought for $100. I never expected the size I received. At first I thought it was too big. I can tell you that I love it. The multi-colored glass is beautiful and makes the white wax stand out. Ive used it everyday since received. I find it amusing, relaxing and interesting. The "blobs" are all different sizes and shapes. I did good. I am enjoying it more than I expected. It replaced one much smaller. I don't know how I've lived without it. A+++++ Buy it. Its worth the $100
customer_reviews.author: NYCharmer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this less than 24 hours but it works and is very pretty. Not five stars because with the price being what it is, I don't think you should have to settle for imperfections as seen in photos. They are inside the glass we left it on for several hours to see if it would go away but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: the unit is pretty much junk
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this product, read some of the reviews! This liquid is this product arrived very cloud and murky. I read the instructions, and also searched on-line for solutions. After following all the remedies to no avail, I contacted the manufacturer directly. She told me, once the wax in the glass globe heats up and is agitated, the unit is pretty much junk. She told me Amazon has had a lot of trouble with this happening. I ordered one directly from Lava Lite, and will be shipping the original back to Amazon for credit. Let's see what happens. So far the service from Amazon has been amazing. You can't blame them for shipping issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bikerx1013

customer_reviews.title: Long warmup is part of its charm
customer_reviews.text: Not for the impatient -- it will take a few hours to warm up. The extra-heavy glass and (of course) its enormous size are the reasons. It has an extra-long period when the wax breaks out and then solidifies into freaky shapes, which is one of my favorite parts. Once it's rolling, it works great. Buy a few extra bulbs: the one that came with it lasted about 8 months with almost-daily usage. It's big and it's heavy, so be sure to put it on a very stable surface (not one to put on top of the speakers).
customer_reviews.author: BillR

customer_reviews.title: It is the size that counts
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a fascination with Lava Lamps. This sucker is huge. I love it. Well packaged for shipping by the manufacturer. I think for the size it is a fair price. Due to the size it can take a while to heat up and get going. It can make some interesting shapes while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Wax turned clear
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month until the wax turned clear. Also the coil got stuck to the side of the glass so blobs rise up the side now instead of the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Paradis

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome!! I bought 2 of the yellow wax/ ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!! I bought 2 of the yellow wax/ purple fluid which look great. All the reviews that say the liquid is cloudy or it doesn't heat correctly are from people that did not read the very short instruction booklet that came with them. 3 to 5 full runs of the lamp gets rid of the cloudiness if there is any and before you run the lamp ensure the bulb is properly centered in the middle of the base and only use 100w bulb types like the product comes with. Buy them for sure and take 2 minutes to read over the booklet...I highly recommend them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A M Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have any problems from shipment and came is EXCELENT CONDITION. This thing is HUGE and love it and my daughter loves it. Was worried from other reviews but I had none of their issues on the bad reviews
customer_reviews.author: Twolong03

customer_reviews.title: Great Huge Lava Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues setting it up or getting this huge lamp started. Was worried it would come damaged or foggy like other reviews but it’s amazing. Just know this thing is huge I was kind of shocked on the scale for the price. Had to reevaluate where I was going to put it in my living room. Also, it takes a very long time to warm up and get flowing. Would say at least 7 hours the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great New Groove :)
customer_reviews.text: My yellow/purple 27” Lava Lamp arrived in perfect condition with a light bulb. The lightbulb was tucked into the styrofoam packaging. This is a massive globe and the color is gorgeous. I notice that there is small reflective particulate in the water creating a cool shimmer/glitter effect. The size and shape of the glove create interesting mirrored reflections of the motion within the globe, very well done. Try to order these when the weather is cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Kühl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! It's not as cool as you would think!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Gave this gift for a very special person. The product's fluid is cloudy and the "lava" is sluggish and sits together like big globs. Item overheats so you have to unplug it to cool, then it takes forever for things to get moving! Very, very sad and disappointed! To large and heavy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Largest Available!  Shipping may ruin product.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this giant lava lamp is so cool! ...except for the foggy liquid and the foamy wax. It was probably jostled during shipping. I am hoping that it will get better with continued use. My advice: definitely get a giant lava lamp, but purchasing in person instead of having it shipped would help guarantee that it makes to your house without the unfortunate results that I have to live with.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but takes hours & hours to do its thing!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is huge!!! Read dimensions before you buy! Once is gets up to temperature, it’s awesome, but it does take quite a few hours to get going. So, it’s something you really need to leave on to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Chew

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Lava Lamps since I first saw one in the seventies. My grandchildren have enjoyed watching the ones I have so I surprised them with this one and she should have heard them when they first saw it in our computer/game room. Just their laughs and the looks of awe is enough to pay for the price of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Standridge

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of wate house items this was said to be like new
customer_reviews.text: Base was badly bent dented unit could not stand. I checked with manufacturer and I could get a new base for 30 dollars plus shipping Amazon would only refund $20 So I am returning it so they can throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Al627

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this lava lamp. First it is huge, largest I have ever seen. Came undamaged, liquid is crystal clear and remains so 6 months later. We have had no problems with near daily use. Yes it does take a few hours to warm each day, then enjoy the show.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Total Frauds and waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Turned in a previous bad review. Wanted to add to it. There is a dent in the front of the base and the on/off switch makes a "snapping " sound and a slight flash when it is turned on. Want to bet this piece of Chinese made junk won't last a month, that is after I get the bulb that didn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful Once it Warms Up.
customer_reviews.text: The product description of the colors is a bit confusing, describing it as yellow wax with blue liquid. The liquid is more purple than blue, and the wax while yellow, appears orange/red in the purple liquid. In other words, it looks just like the picture! It's a nice lamp with quality construction. However it takes FOREVER to get going. So long in fact that I don't use it that often. Even if I turn it on right when I get home from work at 6:30PM, it won't really get going until close to 10PM. I realize it's because it's fairly massive, and I can't really fault the company for the laws of physics, but geesh!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for any trendy room.
customer_reviews.text: Have had some of the smaller ones. This thing is huge. Note, the purple and yellow look REALLY purple and yellow until lamp is turned on, after which it looks red and well.. lava orange. Made an awesome porch decor with a hoodie draped over it for halloween. Cap on top rattles a little if something causes a vibration, like a door shutting near it / fit isn't perfect, but really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Whole Lava Love
customer_reviews.text: These are big, bold, and beautiful. This was bigger than I thought it would be, so make sure you want one this large before buying this size. So far mine works best after being on a few hours; these are reportedly temperature sensitive, and it's cold outside and colder than usual in the lava lamp room, and now also groovier.
customer_reviews.author: Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: The 27-inch Lava Lamp is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful enchanting lamp - so much better display & lava action than the smaller lava lamps. Well worth the price. We have had ours for three years and other than replacing the heating lamp each year it has been better than expected. After two and a half years of using it EVERY DAY (on a timer), the liquid became a bit cloudy, so we replaced the blue liquid and the lava action is even more beautiful than before. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Martin

customer_reviews.title: It’s cloudy.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived cloudy. The instructions said to run it a few days and it will clear up. It didn’t. Now the pain of returning or exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - CLOUDY
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I bought it for my GF as a gift as she loves her small lava lamp,. It's so clear and fun to look at.... This big one is awful. It is so cloudy you almost cannot even see the wax. I want a refund. DO NOT BUY . I've had it turned on for the directed time, tired it all
customer_reviews.author: Colin M. Harter

customer_reviews.title: Frozen when delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Frozen. The is 252 ounces of liquid (~ 2 gallons) will take a long time to thaw. I am guessing this was left in a delivery truck overnight. I am slowly letting it thaw in a 68 degree room. Hopefully it will be useable. I will probably have it up and running in a week or more if there are no cracks in the glass. I will update my review when I see the result of the thawing process.
customer_reviews.author: EAD

customer_reviews.title: The perfect addition to any bachelor pad.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing quality the glass is so clear almost no Speckles unlike the smaller ones that I own. I was scared to order at first because of all the negative reviews about their lamp being cloudy but the gamble paid off. My lamp is very clear and should become even clearer with use.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Colors different in person when on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the purple with yellow liquid. When the lamp is off it appears purple with yellow however when it’s on it is red/magenta and the lava appears to be orange/red. Which is not a big deal. Just wish they would show the pictures with the lamp on. Seems to work well otherwise. Heats up completely in about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanb

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: My mistake, I should have read the reviews before purchasing!! Usually I do, but was in a rush and didn’t read them this time. Won’t do that again! This product is awful. Very cloudy, the wax does not bubble through the lamp - just a couple small wax bubbles hang out at the top of the lamp and don’t move. Lamp is nothing like the advertised picture. Had lava lamps in the past, this is nothing like a lava lamp should be. Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: law

customer_reviews.title: Wax has black chunks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lava lamp for about 7 months now. The water has always been clear purple (which actually looks red) -and the yellow wax globbed beautifully from the start. However, in the last month the springs keep shifting around and black chunks are appearing in the wax. When it's fully heated you can see the black bits sliming around inside the lava bubbles. They look a bit like rotten phlegm.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Crazy tall lava lamp.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this and I didn't believe him till I saw it out of the package. This lamp is HUGE. We had a couple friends help move furniture into our house and they gave us compliments on how cool this map looks in the corner of our bedroom. Also, to our surprise, our 10-year-old cat sat next to it every night for a few weeks. I think it mezmorized her. :)
customer_reviews.author: Megalinsky

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy
customer_reviews.text: nice big , only one thing that glass is with dots, but its working great, lava is giving nice flow. When I got it it was gloomy or cloudy, Im thinking about returning, because its not getting clear. I got one from store and its beautifull clear. I wouldnt buy this one any more:( on the picture small one with clear water and this one cloudy:(
customer_reviews.author: kasia

customer_reviews.title: color faded - still great though
customer_reviews.text: I left this on for a while and the color faded from purple to orange. Its still very pretty but that shouldn't have happened. Had this for 5 years still works great. I did have ti replace the bulb once
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 3rd grande lamp, and 7th lava lamp. The grande lamp is very impressive in it's size. It is relaxing to sit and watch the lava and the shadows it makes on the wall. With my order, I received a broken bulb, and Amazon kindly took care of the order. Ended up ordering a replacement bulb through Amazon also. With previous grande lamps, I don't recall them taking hours heat and see any type of lava movement. I'm concerned that this may be due to the replacement bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and groovy!
customer_reviews.text: It's called the "grande" in the booklet for a reason. IT'S GIGANTIC!!!! My wife's mother had one years ago, and my wife had always wanted one. Well.....here it is in all of its splendor.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Brought mine as a gift for my husband,,,been in the hospital with a heart attack,,was a welcome home gift but came with no lamp soooooo,,,,,never in 50 years have I seen one come with no lamp
customer_reviews.author: sethspeaks

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Its been four months. The unit has completely lost its color and looks awful. Not sure how to contact the seller but i would like the unit replaced
customer_reviews.author: Napa wine lover

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Color changes from purple to CLEAR after a while, even without sun exposure.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was great in the beginning, but now the purple liquid has turned clear. It does not sit out in the sun, and I have no idea why this has happened. I have the other Grande Lava Lamp in green/blue, and the color of the liquid has not changed. UPDATE: I contacted Lava Lamp and the sent me a replacement! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice token piece of art on a budget, plus a lot more fun.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sculpture to make my pensioners apartment complete (otherwise no one will tolerate me... ) I have only ever seen these in magazines. It is significantly better than I could imagine. I don't think they could make one of these larger or it would start to look ridiculous. The purple looks great. If they could supply these at 230V without transformer/GFCI and RCD, I could imagine paying $500 for this in Australia. It goes well with the other few small bits and pieces from yesteryear, I have been able to purchase here on Amazon. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: I've owned a few and this is my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: Big impressive lava lamp; I've owned a few and this is my favorite so far. I've had it a week; the colors are much richer than show in the photos - clear violet liquid with bright orange lava near the bottom, turning to a darker pomegranate color as it reaches the top. I have it on my desk at work, and everyone in the office loves it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lamp looks really great, it's my first one so can't compare to anything. The bulb looked a little high so I made a ring of tin foil were the glass sits just to be safe. First turn on took 6.5 hours for full movement, I don't use it every day but now only takes 5 hours for full motion.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, runs really well and it's massive! It does take 4-5 hours to heat up, so just keep that in mind! Mine came with a good manufacturer defect, it has 2 coils in it...a large one and small one...I couldn't find anyone else with that same "error", but I like it! I love this one so much that I bought another one, the purple and pink one...hoping that one runs just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Silly Goose

customer_reviews.title: Coloring is way off
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a purple liquid with yellow wax. While the wax is yellow, the liquid is a hot pink. The wax is not very visible inside the liquid. While you can see the formations and the wax moving it is not nearly enough contrast. This is an expensive gift that is just not acceptable. I really am disappointed with the way it arrived also. The base has a dent in it. Overall, considering the coloring and the dented base I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE LARGEST THEY MAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This IS the LARGEST Lava Lamp made. I have searched for larger Lava Lamps for many years. This is finally the one! The smaller ones are cute, but no "wow factor". This lamp HAS THE WOW FACTOR!!! Just terrific!!
customer_reviews.author: Artist Cameron

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge, but great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I got my mega lamp in today and I love it!! It’s mesmerizing to watch this thing go. It took quite a while to get going but that’s to be expected when you have to heat over 2 gallons of liquid. No complaints at all from me. Buy one, you’ll love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Awful awful!!😡
customer_reviews.text: Had to return all 3 of them!!😡 awful awful..😡😡 will never buy again had my other one for a couple of months just broke!😡 the heating spring is wrapped around all the lava!!😡 they are awful wont ever buy ever again!! Very upset...😡
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lava Lamp Lux
customer_reviews.text: For all the old (and young) hippies alike. A wonderful addition to any room. Life is short (or this one is anyways) so go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Huge would be a great description for this one. If size is something you need - this is it. From a satisfaction perspective it's very satisfying - however it takes damn near forever to heat it up - about 5hrs to get it going. Since I have mine at work - I only get to enjoy the flowing lava for a couple of hours before its home time. Still it's worth it. Mine arrived in perfect condition - minus the light bulb which was broken...that was a nuisance to replace but overall this unit a great lava lamp. Works as advertised !
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Love the size. Water arrived cloudy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, double boxed. Thing is much bigger in person than I envisioned! Cool! The water however is cloudy. I'm currently following the instructions on cycling it in hopes of clearing it up, but from what I have read, I don't have my hopes up. I may need to return/exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Go big or GTFO
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freakin cool. I was worried about the reviews talking about cloudiness and mine did come delivered pretty cloudy. The cloudiness went away after 24 hours. Gotta remember this thing is getting thrown around and shopmen up during shipping. Be patient and it will be cloudy free. Also, keep in mind the wax takes a very long time to warm up. Mine takes about five hours. I suggest putting it on a timer and have it turn on long before you come home so you can enjoy the groovy action of this awesome lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Duderstadt II

customer_reviews.title: Simply Magnificent..!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about this lava lamp. I received it one day early & it was in prestige condition. 5 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Val Wells

customer_reviews.title: Lavaaaaaaaaa
customer_reviews.text: Great biggest baddest lava lamp I've ever seen. Why waste the money on a little one when you can spend just a little more to get the big one takes about six hours after unpackaging to heat up and start working properly everything appears great
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Globe scratches
customer_reviews.text: Order through the manufacturer not Amazon. I think Amazon has some sketchy old/used ones they seem to be pushing. Glass scratches on the globe. Blurry liquid, bent bulb holders. The one from the manufacturer is wayyyy better
customer_reviews.author: Cregg

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Awesome :-)
customer_reviews.text: A great buy! This thing is HUGE. See pic for perspective. A lot of fun to watch too. Mine came as clear as a bell, no clouds. Love it, love it!!! Hope this helps. Best!
customer_reviews.author: Cabaret Card

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this lamp for about a month. The liquid is still cloudy. I did follow the directions I can’t give it his as a present for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for close to a year and it's my favorite lava lamp ever! The purple with yellow wax changes to a sunset color when it's on and looks fantastic. We set it up on a timer so it has time to cool at night while getting past the "boring" stage in he morning before we get up.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Quartz

customer_reviews.title: Trip Toys
customer_reviews.text: It’s jammin to grok even when I’m not on Acid
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LeRoy Davis

customer_reviews.title: It is large, lol!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes, I may be weird, but I love It! Only mistake was putting it next to my bed thinking it would be relaxing. It is too much fun watching, I find it fascinating!
customer_reviews.author: Seaworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great fot the DIY person
customer_reviews.text: If your a DYI person get this if you want a beautiful lava lamp. All I bought this for was the lamp itself not the lava and water. The water was cloudy but I figured it would be according to all the reviews. Also the lamp globe actually set on top of the bulb and not on the base. So to start with I lowered the lamp socket in the base until the globe set on the base and not on the bulb. Then I ordered a goo kit from Magma Tower and installed it. Now I have a beautiful lava lamp that I am proud to display in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: TRENT TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool, very big lamp! Important note: Your lamp is not broken! It needs a lot of time to heat up and start moving so patience is a must! It didn't come with a bulb so I had to order separately but was able to order online without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so amazing!! Santa brought my house 3 this year and all were in perfect condition. None were cloudy at all like some of the reviews say. Would recommend them to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaymo

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very large Lava lamp. I have had the Lava Lamp for a few months. I love it. Goes great in my Mid Century living room. Takes about 2 hours to heat up. FUN!
customer_reviews.author: SoapsLuva

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Read so much about cloudiness and some attributed that to Amazon, but I also bought this item from Walmart and 2 of theirs were cloudy and returned. This large Lava Lamp is gorgeous... LOVE it... Mesmerizing... Certainly as large as it is and it's not really that BIG.@ 27" (about 2+ feet) A proper placement is needed. I wanted this large Lava Lamp for a special placement on a bookshelf easily seen from ground floor and it works so well there... Thoroughly Delighted...
customer_reviews.author: NYKNOT

customer_reviews.title: Liquid changes and oil/lava doesn't hold color.. Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Lamp came to me with purple liquid and yellow oil as described.. After a month the liquid became clear and the oil/lava turned blood red. Not what I ordered so I give this 1 star. Very unhappy..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hayslip

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks lamp stopped working. So depressed about it. I’ve wanted one of these big boys for years and got skunked :(
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My lamp arrived today with box broken, missing a build and a bent up base. Otherwise this thing would be amazing. A little bummed
customer_reviews.author: Kram Sanecam

product_meta.title: Lava the Original 27-Inch Silver Base Grande Lamp with Pink Wax in Purple Liquid
product_meta.description: Color:MulticolorThe Lava the Original 27-Inch Silver Base Grande Lamp with Pink Wax in Purple Liquid brings the drama of motion and the beauty of soft colored light into your very own space. Watch the pink blobs suspended in purple liquid collide, flow, and split apart as they ooze their way up, down, and around the glass globe of this Lava the Original lamp. A hand-spun silver aluminum base and cap make this lamp truly unique. Make a statement in any room and enjoy the colorful motion of our largest Lava the Original lamp. For over fifty years, the iconic Lava the Original brand has been the pioneer in novelty and conventional lighting products, and today it stands as one of the most recognized, trusted, and beloved brands of all time. At Lava the Original, our commitments to pursuing the latest fashion trends, cutting-edge technology, and unsurpassed quality ensure that we continue to intrigue our older fans while enticing the younger generation with our exciting new product lines. So whether you are six or sixty, we have a Lava the Original lamp product just right for setting the mood of your life.
feature_bullets: Silver aluminum base and cap. Different-sized formations of melted wax collide, flow and split apart as they ooze their way up and down the glass globe
Plugs into a standard 120-Volt wall power outlet

specifications.Warranty Description: Warranted by lava® world international® against defects in workmanship or materials for 90 days from date of purchase. If for any reason
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars921 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
